title: ‘Ethereum is scaling’ — ETH maxis cheer as TPS hits record 24K with Lighter
summary: An explosion in transaction activity on Ethereum layer 2 Lighter since launching last month has pushed Ethereum’s transaction per second count to a record of 24,192.

title: Robinhood isn’t rushing into crypto treasuries, exec says
summary: Robinhood executive Shiv Verma says buying crypto could align it with the community more, but questions if it's “the right thing for shareholders.”

title: Robinhood’s Q3 crypto revenue surges 300% as earnings beat forecasts
summary: Robinhood Markets’ crypto revenue jumped over 300% in Q3, helping to double its revenue from last year to surpass analyst expectations.

title: Rural Texas community fails plan to become a city to curb BTC miner noise
summary: Residents of a small area in Hood County have attempted to form a municipality to exercise authority over a Bitcoin mining site they claim is generating excessive noise.

title: The best crypto treasuries are ‘doing something hard:’ Bitwise
summary: Investors are better off buying ETFs than buying shares in a firm that’s simply putting a crypto asset on its balance sheet, argues Bitwise’s Matt Hougan.

title: Miami mayor Francis Suarez claims he’s up 300% on his Bitcoin salary
summary: Miami Mayor Francis Suarez started receiving his salary in Bitcoin four years ago, when Bitcoin was valued at around $64,000.

title: Bank of England pledges to keep pace with US on stablecoin regulations
summary: The UK’s top bank says it will roll out stablecoin rules “just as quickly as the US” amid concerns that it's lagging behind global allies.

title: Franklin Templeton brings tokenized USD money market fund to Hong Kong
summary: The launch marks Franklin Templeton’s latest step into digital assets, introducing a blockchain-based UCITS fund as Hong Kong accelerates its push toward real-world asset tokenization.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
summary: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: UK ruling in Getty Images' AI lawsuit leaves key IP questions unanswered
summary: The mixed ruling was claimed as a victory by both Stability AI and Getty Images, muddying the legal waters around AI and intellectual property.
